full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Power Distribution Units for DND

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites qualified vendors to bid on the supply of Power Distribution Units (PDUs) for the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Key Details:
- **Tender Reference:** SSC-22-00019954:T
- **Publication Date:** August 15, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 21, 2022 14:00 EST (expired)
- **Estimated Contract Value:** unavailable
- **Location:** Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region
- **Vendor Contact:** Agnes Kowalska (agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- **Industry Classification:** Automatic Data Processing Equipment and System Configuration (NAICS: 334111)

## About the Requirement:

The Department of National Defence (DND) at 45 Sacrée-Coeur Blvd., Gatineau, Quebec is seeking Power Distribution Units as per the attached Request for Quotations document. A responsive bid must adhere to all requirements of the bid solicitation and must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A.

## Submission Requirements:

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, all bids must be submitted electronically via email and not through fax or mailed hard copies, unless in exceptional circumstances.

## Evaluation Method:

The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

## Important Notice:

SSC retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Languages:

Bid documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

The attached Request for Quotations document provides comprehensive details regarding this requirement including bid evaluation criteria, submission guidelines, and clauses.

---

This updated entry eliminates unnecessary text, reduces redundancy, and adheres to standard government tender formatting guidelines.  I corrected several grammar errors and typos in the original text and translated all key headings and sections into English for clarity and concision.  I used proper headings and made the prose clear, concise, and easy to read.
